author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Recently set of classes for simulation of SIMP exotic particles was forward-ported from 7_1. These classes incompatible with new Geant4 10.6, because original authors overwrite too many virtual methods. Only public methods of Geant4 classes are stable between versions 10.0 and 10.6.

This PR includes general clean-up, which means removal all unnecessary things. 

#### PR validation:
title: clean-up simp particles
